scripts.dev: concurrently -n vite,server,resolve -c blue,green,yellow "vite" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:resolve-build"
scripts.dev:resolve: concurrently -n vite,server -c blue,green "vite" "NODE_ENV=development HOST_APP=RESOLVE tsx src/server/server.ts"
scripts.build: npm run build:adobe && npm run build:davinci
scripts.build:parallel: concurrently -n adobe,davinci -c blue,green "npm run build:adobe" "npm run build:davinci"
scripts.build:adobe: npm run prezxp && dotenv -e src/server/.env -- cross-env ZXP_PACKAGE=true NODE_ENV=production vite build
scripts.build:davinci: cross-env RESOLVE_BUILD=true RESOLVE_PACKAGE=true NODE_ENV=production vite build
scripts.prezxp: mkdir -p dist/cep/server && (grep -v '^ZXP_PASSWORD=' src/server/.env > dist/cep/server/.env 2>/dev/null || true) && (rm -f dist/cep/.debug dist/cep/cep/.debug 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.zxp: dotenv -e src/server/.env -- cross-env ZXP_PACKAGE=true vite build
